articles.title: Donald Trump to launch a golden smartphone
articles.summary: The Trump Organization is launching the T1, a 'sleek gold smartphone', and mobile coverage plans in the United States. The T1 phone is designed and built in the United States.

articles.title: I tried signing up for Trump Mobile service. Here's how it went.
articles.author: Shira Ovide
articles.summary: Trump Mobile, a new wireless service from President Donald Trump's family business, has launched. The service bills users, but initial customer experiences indicate issues with starting the wireless service and discrepancies between advertised and actual costs, including an added 'plan telecom tax'.

articles.title: I tried signing up for Trump Mobile service. Here's how it went.
articles.author: Shira Ovide
articles.summary: Trump Mobile, a new wireless service from President Trump's family business, has launched. Initial user experiences reveal billing inconsistencies, where the actual cost, including taxes, exceeds the advertised price of $47.45 per month. The user experienced challenges in activating and using the service after being billed.

articles.title: Is Nvidia Competing With Its GPU Cloud Partners?
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Nvidia launched the DGX Lepton GPU Cloud. Nvidia also launched a manufacturing-focussed cloud with Deutsche Telecom.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Video Review - A Much-Needed Upgrade
articles.author: Jaz Sagoo
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2, a new iteration of its hybrid console. This new console offers increased power and introduces new functionalities, such as using Joy-Cons as a mouse.

articles.title: 35 Newer Items You'll Feel Clever For Discovering First
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Laneige introduces Neo Blurring Powder with blue hyaluronic acid in a travel-friendly case. Dumpling Daughter launches Spicy Sweet Soy sauce, suitable for various culinary applications. Monday Haircare releases Dry Shampoo infused with keratin and gardenia scent. Anua has launched azelaic acid serum. Ninja has launched portable Crispi Air Fryer system.

articles.title: New Trump Mobile brand offers 5G plan and MAGA-themed gold phone
articles.author: Grace Snelling
articles.summary: The Trump Organization is launching Trump Mobile, a new mobile service and smartphone brand. The service, also known as T1 Mobile, offers 5G connectivity through major carriers and includes features like roadside assistance and telehealth. Trump Mobile is also releasing a $499 gold smartphone called the T1 Phone this fall.

articles.title: 2025 Yangwang U8 review
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: BYD's luxury arm, Yangwang, has introduced the U8, a high-end SUV flagship featuring a quad-motor system and a generator-assisted battery. This vehicle boasts high-tech features, including a drone, multiple screens, and exceptional material finishes, combined with off-road capabilities like a 360-degree spinning turn and advanced camera systems.

articles.title: Insane features of ‘preposterous' new SUV
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: BYD's luxury arm, Yangwang, introduced the Yangwang U8, a quad-motor SUV featuring a generator-assisted battery pack, allowing for unique maneuvers like 360-degree spins. The U8 boasts luxurious interiors with multiple screens, exceptional material finishes, and advanced technology and is expected to be priced around $240,000.

articles.title: Trump mobile phone: Specifications, plans, carrier, and all details — is it Made in China?
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Trump Mobile launched the "T1" smartphone, claiming it was "Built in America," but reports indicate it's manufactured in China. The T1, which features a 6.8-inch screen and other advanced features, experienced technical problems during its preorder launch, including website crashes and incorrect charges.

articles.title: Deal of the Day: Ring Battery Doorbell is at its lowest price ever
articles.author: Harry Rabinowitz
articles.summary: Ring's Battery Doorbell is currently offered at a discounted price for Amazon Prime members. This model, launched last year, includes improvements such as increased vertical video coverage, motion detection, color night vision, and two-way talk. It also features a new push-pin mount for easy removal during battery recharging.

articles.title: How to Get 6 Months of Amazon Prime for Free (But Only if You're 18-24)
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Prime for Young Adults, a service targeting 18-24 year olds, offering six free months of Prime access followed by a discounted rate. Subscribers get standard Prime benefits including Prime Video, Prime Music, Grubhub+ subscription, and enhanced cash back during Prime Day and on select purchases.

articles.title: Trump family unveils Trump Mobile with a flashy $500 gold smartphone
articles.author: Jacky Barile
articles.summary: Donald Trump's sons launched Trump Mobile, a new service, on Monday. The offerings include a $500 gold-colored smartphone.

articles.title: Google Pixel 8 Pro cover, with superhero character
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Google has launched a new exclusive-themed cover for the Google Pixel 8 Pro. This innovative cover features a leather material with a three-dimensional logo, wireless charging compatibility, and a raised edge for camera protection. The 'Iron Spider' themed cover is now available and manufactured by Iron Spider.

articles.title: OpenAI's photo generation feature is now available on WhatsApp: Here's how you can use it
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a new image generation feature for its ChatGPT service on WhatsApp, accessible via the 1-800-ChatGPT number. Users can generate images by providing text prompts after linking their ChatGPT account to the WhatsApp service. This initiative aims to make AI-generated visuals more accessible to users.

articles.title: Four reasons why it's a surprisingly bad time to buy a gaming handheld
articles.author: Sean Hollister
articles.summary: The article discusses the current state of handheld gaming devices, including the sold-out Nintendo Switch 2 and Steam Deck OLED. It mentions the Asus ROG Ally X, Lenovo Legion Go S, and MSI Claw, noting recent price increases. Additionally, the article mentions upcoming software updates for these devices, including SteamOS support for the Lenovo Legion Go S and a new Windows version for gaming handhelds.

articles.title: Pittsburgh Penguins' Fantasy NIGHTMARE
articles.summary: Streaming 'WeAreIowa' content requires the 'WeAreIowa' app. This suggests the 'WeAreIowa' app is a necessary component or service for accessing 'WeAreIowa' content.

articles.title: Microsoft confirms next gen Xbox consoles with AMD
articles.author: Game Central
articles.summary: Microsoft is developing next-generation Xbox consoles, including home and portable versions, in collaboration with AMD. These consoles promise enhanced visual quality, immersive gameplay, and AI-powered experiences, with potential access to third-party stores like GOG, Epic Games Store, and Steam.

articles.title: Armored Works Announces Metalcloak as Top-Rated Suspension Brand in AI Complaint Analysis, Outperforming Leading Suspension Brands
articles.author: Metalcloak
articles.summary: Metalcloak, a manufacturer of off-road suspension systems, has been ranked as the top-rated brand in customer satisfaction and product reliability according to an AI-powered analysis. The analysis evaluated several major suspension manufacturers and found that Metalcloak had the lowest complaint rate and consistent positive customer sentiment. The company's products, including its patented Duroflex™ joints and FMVSS 126-certified suspension systems, are built in-house in Northern California.

articles.title: Reddit Inc stock soars 15%: Is it time to buy into the hype? What is ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Reddit introduced a suite of AI-driven advertising solutions.

articles.title: Trump Mobile announced: When can you get wireless plan, new phone?
articles.author: The Hill
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has launched Trump Mobile, adding it to their portfolio of products. Donald Trump Jr. announced the new service.

articles.title: America enters Iran-Israel war? State Dept's chilling announcement sparks WW3 fears - The Economic Times Video
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Trump has entered the telecom market with the launch of a new product, the "Gold T1 Phone." The phone is notable for only allowing users to text in capital letters.

articles.title: Microsoft Teases Multiple Gaming Devices And Next-Gen Xbox As It Doubles Down On Windows
articles.summary: Microsoft is partnering with AMD to co-engineer silicon for next-generation Xbox consoles, aiming for advanced graphics and AI integration while maintaining game library compatibility. The future of Xbox includes a multiplatform strategy with potential Windows integration and support for services like Steam, shifting away from a traditional console-centric approach.

articles.title: 'Imagine the joy!' Celebration of Trump's new venture drips with sarcasm
articles.author: Krystina Alarcon Carroll
articles.summary: The Trump Organization is launching a mobile phone service. This new service features a gold smartphone. The launch is intended to appeal to supporters of Donald Trump.

articles.title: Trump mobile 'unbelievable': Nothing CEO Carl Pei says 'we're cooked' ahead of Phone (3) launch
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has launched the 'Trump Mobile 1' smartphone, priced at $499 and running on Android 15. The device features a 6.78-inch AMOLED screen, 12GB of RAM, 256GB of storage, a triple-camera setup, and a 5,000mAh battery with 20W fast charging. Pre-orders have begun on the official website with a $100 down payment.

articles.title: Crushon AI App Review 2025: Why crushon.ai Is the #1 AI Companion Platform
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: Crushon AI has launched a web-based AI platform in 2025, enabling users to engage with customizable digital companions with a focus on unfiltered NSFW content and emotional realism. The platform offers features like long-form memory, spicy image generation, and diverse personalities, aiming to provide a powerful tool for fantasy interaction and digital relationships.

articles.title: Stay in the know: Sign up for USA TODAY Shopping text alerts today
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: USA Today Shopping is launching a text alert service providing shoppers with exclusive deals and product recommendations, allowing subscribers to customize alerts based on categories. SharkNinja is introducing its new 'F1' collection of high-speed appliances and vacuums.

articles.title: Stay in the know: Sign up for USA TODAY Shopping text alerts today
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: USA Today Shopping is launching a new text alert service, providing subscribers with exclusive deals and product recommendations. The service allows customization based on categories such as tech, home, style, and beauty, aiming to help consumers save money and discover trending products. Examples of products include J.J. Spaun's U.S. Open winning polo and SharkNinja's new 'F1' collection of high-speed appliances and vacuums.

articles.title: Stay in the know: Sign up for USA TODAY Shopping text alerts today
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: USA Today Shopping is launching a new text alert service. The service will provide shoppers with exclusive deals and product recommendations, and subscribers can customize alerts based on categories like tech, home, style, and beauty.

articles.title: Trump Mobile announced: When can you get wireless plan, new phone?
articles.author: Addy Bink
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has launched Trump Mobile, a mobile phone service with a $47.45 monthly plan providing telemedicine, roadside assistance, and unlimited texting to 100 countries. They are also introducing the T1 Phone, a gold smartphone with 256GB storage and Android 15, available for pre-order at $499, with the release date expected in August or September.

articles.title: I tried signing up for Trump Mobile service. Here's how it went.
articles.author: Shira Ovide
articles.summary: Trump Mobile launched a new wireless service, but the initial experience included higher-than-advertised costs due to added telecom taxes. Activation issues were encountered, with customers finding QR codes or activation buttons marked 'coming soon!' on the service's online platform.

articles.title: Samsung's New Website: Worldwide Redesign
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung has launched a redesigned website with a modern UI, enhanced animations, and improved performance. The update provides a unified experience for customers globally and includes features such as larger images, a transparent menu bar, and a redesigned color selection menu for Galaxy devices. This launch precedes the anticipated release of the Galaxy Z foldable phones and Galaxy Watch 8.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 is coming - and here's everything you need to know
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Amazon is launching its Prime Day sale from July 8th to 11th, featuring discounts on various products across departments like fashion, beauty, home, and entertainment. The sale includes offers from brands like Dyson, CeraVe, Ninja, Shark and Bose and also Amazon offers Today's Big Deals and New Deal Drop. Shoppers can find deals on specific products like Shark FlexStyle, CeraVe Blemish Control Cleanser, and De'Longhi Bean to Cup Coffee Machine.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025: Everything you need to know
articles.author: LYDIA WHEATLEY
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing 'Today's Big Deals' for Prime members during Amazon Prime Day 2025, featuring daily themed deals. The event will offer discounts on products from brands like Bose, Dyson, Lego, Shark, CeraVe, Ninja, Sonos, and others. Previous Prime Day events featured deals on Amazon devices, Shark vacuums, Ninja air fryers, Apple devices, and Remington hair straighteners.

articles.title: Trump Mobile map is pulled after 'Gulf of Mexico' sparks buzz on social media
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched Trump Mobile, a new cellular service, and the 'T1' smartphone. The service is powered by Liberty Mobile Wireless and aims to capitalize on Trump's political influence. The new venture also promises a gold smartphone eventually available for $499.

articles.title: Trump's impossible smartphone: Why no one believes it can be made in the US at that price
articles.author: Jordi Pérez Colomé
articles.summary: Donald Trump's sons unveiled the Trump 1, a gold-plated mobile phone, set to launch in September with a retail price of $499. Trump Mobile also offers Plan 47, a mobile call and data plan priced at $47.45, which is a mobile virtual network available in the U.S.

articles.title: Robinhood Markets brings advanced charting experience to mobile
articles.summary: Robinhood Markets has upgraded its mobile trading platform, introducing an advanced charting experience called Robinhood Legend and a simulated returns pre-trade tool for options traders. The Legend charts will be available on the mobile app, with options simulated returns pre-trade rolling out to eligible U.S. and U.K. customers in the coming weeks. The new features include live candlesticks, faster trade entry, and seamless transition between web and mobile charting, available at no extra cost.

articles.title: I tried signing up for Trump Mobile service. Here's how it went.
articles.author: Shira Ovide
articles.summary: Trump's family business launched Trump Mobile, a new wireless service. This includes a promised $499 'made in America' smartphone.

articles.title: Trump Mobile pulls coverage map after ‘Gulf of Mexico' label sparks chatter online
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Trump Mobile launched a new mobile service. It initially featured a coverage map that was later removed and announced a future gold smartphone for $499. Trump Mobile is powered by Liberty Mobile Wireless and uses T-Mobile's network data for its coverage.

articles.title: Meta Unveils New AI Ad Tools, Including Improved Video Generation Options
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Meta is introducing new AI-powered advertising options such as image-to-video generation, AI-driven business AIs for customer interaction, improved AI image generation with custom branding, and virtual try-on features. These enhancements aim to provide advertisers with more automated and personalized tools, potentially leading to better results and increased return on ad spend.

articles.title: What does AI mean and why can it be a content generator
articles.author: Neel Achary
articles.summary: Article Crafter utilizes artificial intelligence to generate content, offering a way to create articles and test the software's quality for free. AI-powered content generators can assist businesses in generating content, potentially saving time and resources, though their effectiveness depends on the quality of input data.

articles.title: What is Trump Mobile and gold T1 phone? Is it really made in USA? Answers to your questions
articles.author: Cheryl McCloud
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched a new cellular service called Trump Mobile and a new mobile phone called the T1 Phone. Trump Mobile will offer 5G service through "The 47 Plan" for $47.45 per month, while the T1 phone, priced at $499, features Android 15, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a 50MP camera, with pre-orders available on trumpmobile.com.

articles.title: OpenAI's photo generation feature is now available on WhatsApp: Here's how you can use it
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched an image generation feature for its ChatGPT service on WhatsApp, accessible through the 1-800-ChatGPT number. Users can generate images by providing text prompts after linking their ChatGPT account to the WhatsApp service. This expansion makes AI-generated visuals more accessible via the popular messaging platform.

articles.title: Amazon's Prime Day event will expand to four days this year. Here's what to know.
articles.author: Mary
articles.summary: Amazon is extending Prime Day to a four-day event from July 8-11, offering exclusive deals to Prime members across various categories like electronics, clothing, and groceries. The event, which started a decade ago, includes early deals on Grubhub+, grocery deliveries, Amazon devices and brands, and is available in twenty countries with others participating later in the summer.

articles.title: Trump launches new gold smartphone ‘made entirely in US'
articles.author: Faizel Patel
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has launched a new gold smartphone called the T1 Phone 8002, priced at $499 with a $100 deposit, and a wireless service plan called the 47 Plan priced at $47.45 a month. Trump Mobile claims the T1 Phone is built in the United States and the 47 plan will offer '5G service through all three major cellular carriers' – T-Mobile, Verizon and AT&T.

articles.title: Then & Now: A Photo History of the World's Favorite Tech
articles.author: Kate Farley
articles.summary: The content highlights the evolution of technologies from initial prototypes to current advanced models. It specifically mentions the comparison between the first iPhone and current models, and the original Tesla Roadster with newer versions, showcasing the progression of product development in these companies.

articles.title: Hot Deals Text Alerts: July 4th & Prime Day
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: A curated deals text service delivers savings directly to users' phones. The service involves experts curating and verifying deals, sending daily texts with increased frequency during major sales events like Amazon Prime Day. Users can also request notifications for specific items they are looking for.

articles.title: Reddit unveils social listening tool and conversation add-ons
articles.author: Anu Adegbola
articles.summary: Reddit launched two alpha-stage AI-powered products called Community Intelligence tools. These tools offer access to consumer conversations, enabling brands to validate creative, monitor sentiment, and use social proof in ads. Reddit plans to launch more tools that leverage its conversations into structured intelligence.

articles.title: AMBASSADOR SIMONE BILES FRONTS THE NEW K18 AIRWASH™ FITNESS CAMPAIGN
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: A company has launched a futuristic hair and scalp cleaning product that requires no water.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day returns July 8 with four days of deals
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting its annual Prime Day event from July 8-11, featuring discounts for Prime members on a wide range of products. This year's event introduces a new "Today's Big Deals" feature, showcasing exclusive and exciting deals for Prime members.  Discounts are available on various products, not just tech, including kitchen products, clothing, and health items.

articles.title: IPG Introduces NovaSeal PRO, Offering Exceptional Value in Residential Roofing Underlayment
articles.author: Intertape Polymer Corp
articles.summary: IPG has launched NovaSeal® PRO, a new synthetic roof underlayment designed for weather barrier performance and value. NovaSeal PRO features waterproof polyolefins and a texturized top-surface, meeting ASTM D8257 standards and suitable for various roofing materials in residential applications.

articles.title: Everything you need to know as dates for Amazon Prime Day released
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day is approaching with deals on brands like Bose, Dyson, Shark, and Ninja. Amazon is introducing a 'Today's Big Deals' page featuring daily themes. Current deals include the Dreo 42 Inch Pilot Max Smart Tower Fan, Shark FlexBreeze Pro Mist Fan, Samsung Galaxy A16 Smartphone, INIU Portable Charger, Shark Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, VAX Pace Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Shark SpeedStyle Hair Dryer, and ghd Gold Hair Straightener.

articles.title: Shopware presents new product innovations: Agentic Commerce and B2B solutions for complex business models
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Shopware introduced Agentic Commerce and new AI-driven solutions, including Shopware AI with features like an AI-powered Image Editor and the chat-based Copilot. They also announced new 'B2B Components' to support business growth at every stage. The launch of the Copilot is the first step in Agentic Commerce, with further AI Agents to follow soon.

articles.title: Nextworld Launches Newest Release With Enhanced AI Features Across the Platform
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Nextworld launched its newest platform release, 25.1, featuring enhanced AI capabilities. The release includes tools to build AI-powered agents, pre-packaged skills across various business functions, and AutoML for machine learning predictions without code. This allows users to automate decisions, act on insights in real time and enables business users to train and deploy models.

articles.title: NICE-PAK REVITALIZES WET-NAP® WIPES
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Nice-Pak Products, Inc. has relaunched its Wet-Nap brand wipes to meet consumer demand for an all-purpose wipe. The Wet-Nap wipes, known for their gentle cleansing formula, are available in one size (90 wipes per package, 6 packages per case) and can be used for cleaning hands, faces, and body at home or on the go.

articles.title: Netflix Houses Opening: New Experiences Coming Late 2025
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Netflix is launching 'Netflix House', physical spaces offering immersive experiences based on its popular shows and movies, slated to launch in late 2025. The initial locations will be in Dallas and Philadelphia, featuring interactive games, themed dining, exclusive merchandise, and entertainment hubs. This venture represents a shift in entertainment consumption, moving towards immersive experiences and brand engagement.

articles.title: Hero teases Vida VX2 electric scooter ahead of launch on July 1
articles.summary: Hero MotoCorp is launching the Vida VX2 on July 1, an affordable electric scooter under the Vida sub-brand. The VX2 is a rebadged version of the Vida Z model showcased in Europe, adapted for the Indian market, and it is expected to compete with entry-level rivals like the Bajaj Chetak and TVS iQube with an expected aggressive price undercutting the Vida V2.

articles.title: 5 reasons to buy the new Trump Mobile phone
articles.author: Craig Grannell
articles.summary: Trump Mobile is launching a new phone called T1 Phone 8002. The phone boasts features such as a 6.8-inch screen, 50MP camera and a 3.5mm headphone jack, but key specifications like processor and waterproofing are not disclosed. Pre-orders are being accepted with a $100 down payment, with delivery expected in September.

articles.title: This Game Has a Giant Dragon Lady and Now I Wanna Play It
articles.author: Ana Valens
articles.summary: Inti Creates has developed and published 'Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark,' a 2D action-adventure platformer and spin-off of the Gal Gun series. The game retails for $29.99 and is currently on sale with a 20% discount until June 17th.

articles.title: Sun-kissed surprises: Instamart's mango ad ripens new era in newspaper advertising
articles.author: Shajan Kumar
articles.summary: Swiggy Instamart launched a print advertisement campaign using photochromatic ink in the Hindustan Times. The advertisement reveals golden mangoes when exposed to sunlight, promoting the mango season and Instamart's services.

articles.title: New Tree's Desugared Juice Revolutionizes Fruit Nutrition: Full Nutritional Value with Zero Sugar and No Guilt
articles.summary: New Tree Fruit Company launched a new De-Sugared™ Juice product, utilizing its FDA-approved, patented De-Sugaring™ technology which eliminates 100% of natural sugar while retaining essential nutrients. This product is initially offered in 30ML and 50ML single-serve options and is manufactured in partnership with Elevate Manufacturing.

articles.title: 41 Genius Practical Products To Make Your Life Easier
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: This selection of products features innovations such as a stain-repellent spray that creates a protective layer on furniture, a dandruff shampoo utilizing ketoconazole to eliminate fungus and itchiness, and a fruit soft serve maker for creating custom frozen treats. Additionally, a wine filter wand is introduced to remove histamines and sulfites, aiming to prevent wine-induced headaches.

articles.title: DeepSeek rival MiniMax says its first AI reasoning model halves compute of R1
articles.author: Ben Jiang
articles.summary: MiniMax, a Shanghai-based AI start-up, has launched MiniMax-M1, an open-source reasoning model. The M1 model consumes less than half the computing power of DeepSeek-R1 for reasoning tasks and matches the performance of models from Google, OpenAI, and Anthropic in various benchmarks like maths and coding. It is built on the MiniMax-Text-01 foundational model and employs Lightning Attention technique.

articles.title: The Future of DIY Content: How Free AI Video and Voice are Empowering Individual Creators
articles.author: satmin
articles.summary: The article highlights the transformative impact of AI-driven video and voice tools like Pippit AI, Synthesia, and ElevenLabs on content creation, offering businesses cost-effective, scalable, and personalized content solutions. These tools enable the creation of high-quality videos and voiceovers for various purposes, enhancing audience engagement and expanding global reach. By using AI, businesses can optimize content production, make content more accessible, and drive sales more effectively.

articles.title: UMAXX Applauds Trump Mobile Launch, Extends Offer to Collaborate on Secure U.S.-Made Smartphones
articles.summary: UMAXX's Liberty and Liberty Plus smartphones, assembled in the U.S. with privacy features like physical kill switches, are available to consumers. Each Liberty Phone includes UMAXX's live TV service and offers plans starting at $99/month for unlimited talk, text, and data on UMAXX's secure 5G network. The smartphones run on PureOS and are compatible with major carriers.

articles.title: Up to 48% off on washing machines from LG, Whirlpool, Godrej and more on Amazon across top and front load models
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: LG, Samsung, Haier, Voltas Beko, Godrej, and Whirlpool introduced new washing machine models with enhanced features. LG's models include AI Direct Drive, Steam, and Wi-Fi connectivity, while Samsung's models feature AI Wash, AI EcoBubble, and Wi-Fi support. Haier's models come with AI-DBT and PuriSteam, and Godrej focuses on zero-pressure technology for low water pressure conditions.  Whirlpool highlights stain wash technology with an in-built heater. Voltas Beko provides 6.5kg washing machine with 5 star rating. Many models are currently available with discounts on Amazon.

articles.title: 36 Great Alternatives To Pricey Brand-Name Items
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: E.l.f. launched Hydrating Core Lip Shine similar to Clinique's Black Honey and Halo Glow Liquid Filter, a dupe of Charlotte Tilbury's Flawless Filter. L'Oréal Paris launched True Match Lumi Glotion which is an alternative to Drunk Elephant's bronzing drops. Dossier released Ambery Vanilla perfume inspired by YSL Black Opium. Glossmetics introduced Lychee Overnight Lip Mask designed to deeply hydrate and Cushionaire introduced cork-bottom sandals that are similar to Birkenstocks. Peach Slices released Acne Spot Dots which are like Hero's Mighty Patches and many other brand's products are introduced as alternatives to known brands.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 with the Segment's Only 3x50MP Pro-Grade AI Camera System Goes on Sale Today at Just Rs. 24,999*
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Motorola Edge 60 smartphone in India, featuring AI-led experiences and a triple 50MP AI camera system. The phone boasts a 6.7" 1.5K quad-curved pOLED display and is powered by moto AI with 12GB RAM, and will be available at a price of Rs. 24,999 on Flipkart, Motorola.in and leading retail stores across India.

articles.title: 'Imagine the joy!' Celebration of Trump's new venture drips with sarcasm
articles.author: Krystina Alarcon Carroll
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched 'Trump Mobile,' a new mobile phone service featuring telemedicine and other features. The service includes the T1 Trump Mobile phone for $499 plus a monthly charge. Experts have raised concerns regarding security and data privacy of the devices.

articles.title: Amazon announces Prime Day Canada 2025 is four days: What else is different this year
articles.author: Randi Mann
articles.summary: Amazon is extending Prime Day Canada 2025 to four days (July 8-11) to give Prime members more time to shop and save on products. Amazon will highlight Canadian brands through the 'Canada Showcase' storefront, offering special Prime Day deals to help members discover and save on Canadian products.

articles.title: Motorola Unveils AI-Powered Edge 60 in India
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Motorola has introduced its new Motorola Edge 60 smartphone, featuring AI-driven capabilities, a 50MP triple-camera system with a Sony LYTIA 700C sensor, and a 30X AI Super Zoom. The device has a 6.7-inch quad-curved pOLED display and is priced at INR 24,999.

articles.title: Matter Launches Customizable Consumer PR Solutions for Holiday Gift Guides, Influencer Marketing + Press Events
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Matter Communications has launched new project-based public relations offerings designed for B2C companies. These offerings include holiday gift guide outreach, custom influencer campaigns, experiential press events, and tradeshow media relations strategy. They are aimed at increasing brand awareness and visibility through high-impact PR programs.

articles.title: Amazon reveals Prime Day 2025 dates: Here's when you can shop the annual sale
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day 2025 is scheduled from July 8 to July 11, offering exclusive deals for Prime members across various categories like beauty, tech, fashion, kitchen, and home. Discounts will be available on Amazon's own devices like Echo, Ring, and Fire devices, as well as products from brands like Apple, Sony, Samsung, KitchenAid, Ninja, and Le Creuset.

articles.title: Dyson has slashed $150 off its ‘dust revealing' vacuum and it's the best deal we've seen in 2025
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: Dyson has reduced the price of its V15 Detect Absolute cordless vacuum from $750 to $600. Dyson has also released a new version of the Supersonic Hair Dryer, featuring a lightweight design and multiple attachments for precise drying and scalp moisture retention.

articles.title: Nintendo unveils powerful Switch 2 with bigger OLED screen
articles.summary: A new game is launching with faster performance, an improved design, and a $500 price. Only one new game will be available at launch.

articles.title: 32 TikTok-Famous Beauty Products Reviewers Say They'll Buy Again
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream formulated with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder that absorbs oil and blurs pores. Olay released Super Serum Body Wash packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration. Dae launched Hair Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand. Touchland released Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer infused with aloe vera and floral scents.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Launch Date, Price In India, USA, Dubai, Design, Camera, Specifications, All New Leaks
articles.author: Sparsh Sharma
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 at the Galaxy Unpacked event in New York City in mid-July. The Z Fold 7 is expected to feature a wider 6.5-inch cover display, a slimmer design of 3.9mm when unfolded, a 200-megapixel main sensor, and be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset with up to 1TB of storage. The phone will run One UI 8 based on Android 16, with enhanced Galaxy AI integration.

articles.title: 24 Laundromat brings Finnish innovation to Bilston with fifth UK opening
articles.author: Ruth Berry
articles.summary: 24 Laundromat opened a new location in Bilston, UK, offering services such as specialized washers, energy-efficient dryers, and secure drying lockers. The company provides affordable laundry solutions with features like non-scented, allergy-tested detergent, addressing concerns about energy costs for households. This opening is part of 24 Laundromat's expansion plans, leveraging its successful business model from Finnish locations.

articles.title: Trump unveils $499 gold mobile phones for ‘real Americans'
articles.author: Dan Seddon
articles.summary: The Trump Organisation, overseen by Donald Jr and Eric, is launching a new golden smartphone and mobile service called 'Trump Mobile' in September. The company aims to deliver high-quality service and cater to customers who want an American-based provider.

articles.title: Goji Labs Launches New Product Strategy Framework for PE Firms
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Goji Labs has launched a new product strategy framework targeting private equity firms. This framework aims to reduce risks, eliminate waste, and accelerate the scaling of portfolio companies by providing a data-driven roadmap for product development.

articles.title: Goji Labs Launches New Product Strategy Framework for PE Firms
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Goji Labs launched a new product strategy framework targeting private equity firms. The framework aims to reduce risk, cut waste, and accelerate the scaling of portfolio companies. It provides a data-driven roadmap and helps firms avoid common pitfalls in digital innovation.

articles.title: Trump Organization to launch mobile phone service and $499 golden handset
articles.author: Zehra Munir
articles.summary: The Trump Organization is launching 'Trump Mobile,' a mobile phone service. The service includes a gold-colored device priced at $499, set to release in August. The flagship plan will cost $47.45 per month.

articles.title: Trump Organization to launch mobile phone service and $499 golden handset 特朗普集团将推出移动电话服务和售价499美元的金色手机
articles.summary: The Trump Organization plans to launch a new mobile phone service. This initiative represents the latest effort by the Trump family business to capitalize on Donald Trump's return to the White House.

articles.title: Lidl is selling a £5.99 drinks dispenser that will be perfect for your summer garden parties and BBQs
articles.author: Laura McGuire
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a range of new products, including a £5.99 drinks dispenser, a dupe for the Stanley Cup also priced at £5.99, a Dual View Air Fryer Oven for £79.99, and a Vax Dual Power Carpet Cleaner for £79.99. These items are part of Lidl's "Middle of Lidl" offers and will be available in stores while stocks last, starting Sunday, June 22.

articles.title: New School Foods Expands Breakthrough Manufacturing Technology Into Red Meat
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: New School Foods formed NS/TX Industries Inc. to house its proprietary manufacturing technology platform. NS/TX's patented scaffolding process creates realistic whole-cut alternatives to meat and seafood. New School Foods plans to launch new meat products in the near future.

articles.title: New School Foods Expands Breakthrough Manufacturing Technology Into Red Meat
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: New School Foods has announced the formation of NS/TX Industries Inc. NS/TX will encompass the proprietary manufacturing technology platform, the New School Foods™ consumer brand, and manufacturing operations. This expansion signifies a move beyond seafood into plant-based meat alternatives.

articles.title: Here's when Amazon Prime Day is taking place this year
articles.author: Dan Grabham
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting Prime Day, a 96-hour event starting July 8, 2025, offering up to 50% off on various products. New for this year, Amazon introduces "Today's Big Deals," featuring daily themed deals, and "New Deal Drop" deals launching at midnight every day.

articles.title: Trump Mobile: What is the gold phone from the Trump family?
articles.author: Rachael Davies
articles.summary: Donald Trump Jr. announced a new package of services including telemedicine via phone, roadside assistance for cars, and unlimited texting to 100 countries for a flat monthly fee.

articles.title: LUNESI Officially Launches: Elevating the Standards of Modern Haircare
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LUNESI, a UK-formulated haircare brand, is officially launching in London this summer with sales expected to begin in late June. The brand, fronted by Candice Swanepoel, focuses on high-performance ingredients designed to address common hair concerns. LUNESI offers a 15-minute ritual aimed at nourishing hair and restoring inner balance.

articles.title: Armored Works Announces Metalcloak as Top-Rated Suspension Brand in AI Complaint Analysis, Outperforming Leading Suspension Brands
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Metalcloak, specializing in off-road suspension systems and body armor, ranked first in customer satisfaction and product reliability according to an AI-powered complaint analysis. Metalcloak was recognized for its quality engineering and responsive customer support, reflecting its commitment to building smarter, safer, and more capable off-road products.

articles.title: Trump goes mobile, launches unlimited 5G plan and promises gold standard with upcoming T1 phone
articles.summary: Donald Trump has launched Trump Mobile, a 5G wireless service, and the T1 smartphone. Trump Mobile will be available for $47.45 a month and includes telemedicine and roadside assistance. The T1 smartphone is marketed as designed and built in the United States, though manufacturing details remain unclear.

articles.title: Which CPU is best for your Copilot+ laptop? Intel vs AMD vs Snapdragon
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Qualcomm introduced its Snapdragon X Elite processor as Microsoft's Copilot+ launch partner, featuring in devices like the Surface Laptop and Surface Pro. Intel launched its Core Ultra Series 2 (Lunar Lake) chips, qualifying for Copilot+ status, while AMD released the Ryzen AI 300 series, prioritizing performance in laptops. These chips are featured in laptops like the Lenovo Yoga Pro 9i.

articles.title: The Trump family's next venture is a mobile phone company
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: The Trump family company is launching a mobile phone company. This new venture was announced while Donald Trump is in the White House.

articles.title: Trump Organization launches mobile service, touting a $499 phone
articles.author: CBC
articles.summary: The Trump family business has launched "Trump Mobile," a new mobile service and a $499 smartphone in the US. The service includes telemedicine, roadside assistance, and international texting, while the smartphone, promoted as a "sleek, gold smartphone", aims to be designed and built in the United States.

articles.title: Amazon makes major change to its Prime Day as exact dates for huge summer sale confirmed
articles.author: Laura Mcguire
articles.summary: Amazon is extending its Prime Day event to four days, running from July 8 to July 11. The event includes new offers like "Today's Big Deals" and "New Deal Drop," providing discounts on brands such as Bose, De'Longhi, Dyson, Lego, Shark, CeraVe, Ninja, and Sonos.

articles.title: Every bargain hitting Aldi middle aisle this week including giant sprinkler & chunky sandals – prices start from £1.29
articles.author: Olivia Stringer
articles.summary: ALDI is launching new 'Specialbuys' including chunky sandals priced at £9.99, children's sandals at £3.99, and Chupa Chups car fresheners for £1.29. Additionally, a Giant Sprinkler for £19.99 and various family games will be available starting June 22nd.

articles.title: ChatGPT image-generation now available to all WhatsApp users
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT's image generation feature on WhatsApp, making it available to all users. Users can access the feature by adding 1-800-ChatGPT to their contacts and linking their OpenAI account, which allows them to generate images using text prompts.

articles.title: Home-grown tech start-up shows off its robotic arm-fitted AI mamak shop
articles.summary: Unistop, a local start-up, developed Mr R, an automated retail solution which is a robotic convenience kiosk. Unistop plans to upgrade Mr R's robotic arm with sensor grippers capable of handling soft items such as boiled eggs, tofu and sushi. Furthermore, the kiosk latest model is covered with screens that can serve as advertising space or push promotions to get passers-by interested in the kiosk's offerings.

articles.title: Trump Org releases golden smartphone (PHOTO, VIDEO)
articles.author: Russia Today
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched Trump Mobile, a new self-branded mobile phone service with US-assembled devices and call centers based in the US. The venture features the 'T1 Phone,' a gold smartphone available in August for $499, with a monthly phone plan costing $47.45. Trump Mobile promises nationwide coverage and exclusive perks for subscribers, including 24/7 roadside assistance and access to telehealth features.

articles.title: Trump Org releases golden smartphone (PHOTO, VIDEO)
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched a self-branded mobile phone service. This mobile phone service is a new product from the company.

articles.title: The Selfridges Summer Sale is the sales event of the season
articles.summary: GHD, Lancôme, and Keihl's offer opportunities to discover new beauty products and upgrade existing routines. Consumers can upgrade hair tools or introduce percussive massage into their post-workout routine. These brands encourage beauty enthusiasts to refresh their bathroom cabinets.

articles.title: Trump Family Unveils T1 Smartphone and Trump Mobile Network, Emphasizing ‘Made in America'
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched the T1 smartphone and Trump Mobile wireless service. The T1 smartphone, designed and built in the United States, is available for pre-order at $499 and features a 6.78-inch OLED display and a 50MP camera. Trump Mobile offers 'The 47 Plan' for $47.45 per month, providing unlimited calls, texts, data, telehealth access, and roadside assistance; it operates as an MVNO through Liberty Mobile leveraging T-Mobile's network.

articles.title: 29 Really Cool Things I Found On TikTok
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder for a matte complexion. Avon introduced Skin So Soft bath oil as a moisturizer and bug bite deterrent. Olay released Super Serum Body Wash, mirroring their popular facial serum. Mise En Scene launched Perfect Serum for hair hydration and heat protection. Anua introduced Heartleaf Pore-Clearing Cleansing Oil to dissolve makeup, attack blackheads, and works to remove excess sebum without stripping away natural oils or drying out your skin. Catrice introduced "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a lightweight, color-adapting formula blends so seamlessly under makeup

articles.title: Trump mobile phone is here: Price, features, and everything you didn't ask for
articles.author: TOI Trending Desk
articles.summary: Donald Trump Jr. and Eric Trump introduced the T1 Phone, a gold-colored Android smartphone with a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, 256GB of storage, and a 50-megapixel camera, priced at $499. The Trump kids also unveiled "The 47 Plan," a mobile service plan costing $47.45 per month offering unlimited talk, text, and data within the US, along with benefits such as 5G access, roadside assistance, and telehealth services.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025: Official Dates, Details, and 50 Early Deals
articles.author: Clara Mcmahon
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Prime Day 2025 deals starting July 8th, including early discounts on products from brands like Apple (AirPods, Apple Watch Series 10), Coach (crossbody bags), Dyson (vacuums), and Ninja (Creami ice cream maker). The sale features a variety of items from fashion to home goods and tech, with some deals offering up to 80% off.

articles.title: How will Trump Mobile work as US president unveils $500 phone?
articles.author: Fionnuala Boyle
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has launched Trump Mobile, a new smartphone and wireless service aimed at "real Americans." The T1 Phone will be available in August for $499, with a monthly plan costing $47.45, offering unlimited calls, texts, and data, along with other services. Trump Mobile aims to compete with tech giants like Apple and Samsung.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 Launch In India: Release Date, Expected Price, Specifications, And More
articles.summary: OnePlus is set to launch the OnePlus Nord 5, OnePlus Nord CE 5, and OnePlus Buds 4 in India on July 8, 2025. The OnePlus Nord 5 will feature a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, LPDDR5X RAM, and an advanced cooling system, while the OnePlus Buds 4 will come with Hi-Res LHDC 5.0, dual drivers, and 3D Audio support.

articles.title: Startups building foundational AI to get $1m AWS credits
articles.author: Seyi John Salau
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has announced the launch of the 2025 AWS Generative AI Accelerator (GAIA) program, offering $1 million in credits, mentorship, and enterprise-grade expertise to 40 selected startups globally. The program aims to scale early-stage startups focusing on foundational generative AI technologies, providing access to AWS's generative AI tech stack and go-to-market support.

articles.title: I can't wait to get a Trump Mobile gold phone to pay respect to my MAGA king
articles.author: Rex Huppke
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has launched a new mobile phone service called Trump Mobile, along with a smartphone called 'T1'. The service is priced with the phone at $499 plus a monthly service charge. While initially manufactured in China, there are plans to potentially build the phones in America in the future.

articles.title: I can't wait to get a Trump Mobile gold phone to pay respect to my MAGA king
articles.author: Rex Huppke
articles.summary: The Trump Organization is launching a mobile phone service called "Trump Mobile" featuring a gold smartphone. The phone is priced at $499 plus a monthly mobile-service charge. A partner in the Trump Mobile operation mentioned plans to eventually build the phones in America.

articles.title: [TEST] Dew It for the Glow! Here's How Cosmoderm's Hyaluronic Acid Range Helps M'sians Get Hydrated Skin
articles.author: Vivian Rachel
articles.summary: Cosmoderm is launching its new Hyaluronic Acid Range on June 27, 2025, featuring three products: a Hydrating Gentle Cleanser (RM21.50), an Essential Hydrating Serum (RM39.90), and an All-Day Hydrating Moisturiser (RM29.90). The range is designed to hydrate and improve skin health, with special launch event planned.

articles.title: 'Only allows you to text in caps': Donald Trump launches mobile phones; social media reacts
articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.summary: Trump Mobile has launched a new mobile phone called the T1 Phone, priced at $499 with a $47.45 monthly plan. The phone includes unlimited calls, texts, data, roadside assistance, and telehealth services. The service will be powered by existing networks, likely Verizon, AT&T and T-Mobile.

articles.title: Samsung to Launch 2025 Line-up of Bespoke AI Appliances in India on June 25
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its 2025 range of Bespoke AI appliances in India on June 25th. The lineup includes AI-powered refrigerators, washing machines, washer dryer combos, and air conditioners designed for smart home integration. These appliances feature intelligent touch displays, two-way natural conversation, and SmartThings integration, promising a connected and personalized user experience.

articles.title: ⚡OnePlus Nord CE 5, OnePlus Nord 5 Coming on July 8, 2025; Here's Everything To Expect
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch the OnePlus Nord 5, OnePlus Nord CE 5, and OnePlus Buds 4 on July 8, 2025. Information regarding the expected specifications, features, and price range of the new OnePlus Nord series smartphones and buds has been released.

articles.title: 30 Products To Keep Your Home Tidy (Because Being Neat And Clean Feels, Well, *Neat*)
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The content introduces a range of cleaning and organizing products designed to simplify household tasks. These include a Wet & Forget shower cleaner, a ChomChom pet hair remover, a handheld allergen vacuum, Scrubbing Bubbles toilet cleaning stamp and many more solutions designed for specific cleaning challenges around the house. It is designed to make cleaning as easy as possible with new innovative product offerings.

articles.title: Oppo launches A5i smartphone priced from RM399, featuring 6.67in screen and 5,100mAh battery
articles.author: Christopher Fam
articles.summary: Oppo has launched the A5i, a budget-oriented smartphone featuring a Snapdragon 6s 4G Gen1 processor and a 6.67in display. The A5i comes with up to 6GB RAM, 128GB internal storage, a 5,100mAh battery with 45W SuperVooc fast charging, and is available in Nebula Red and Starry Purple, with prices starting at RM399.

articles.title: Popeyes to open second location in Northern Ireland
articles.author: Sophie Mclaughlin
articles.summary: Popeyes, an American fast-food chain, is opening its second location in Northern Ireland at The Junction retail complex in Antrim town. The new location will serve American Southern-style chicken dishes, seafood, and sides, including chicken sandwiches, tenders, hot wings, and wraps. Their first store in Northern Ireland opened in September last year at Lesley Forestside Shopping Centre in Belfast.

articles.title: Six New Melbourne Coffee and Matcha Shops To Try This Winter
articles.author: Aastha Agrawal
articles.summary: Giu Giu Preston introduces zeppola and iced ube matcha. The Sneaker Laundry Lab CBD launches inventive matcha drinks such as matcha kult and the matcha cloud. Aokuma Cafe Hawthorn presents matcha cheesecake latte and Tokachi-style butadon.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Wonder, New Food Delivery Concept, To Open In First Location In Nassau
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Wonder, a new food delivery and takeout concept, is set to open its first location in Nassau County at Plainview's Woodbury Plaza. The service partners with renowned chefs to provide a diverse menu with quick delivery from multiple restaurants.

articles.title: Trump mobile launched:  Internet can't stop laughing at the wildest features
articles.author: TOI Trending Desk
articles.summary: Donald Trump launched a smartphone service called Trump Mobile in June 2025. The service costs $47.45/month, referencing Trump's status as the 45th and 47th U.S. president, while the device price is $499. Features include all-caps texting and a voice assistant potentially voiced by Laura Loomer.

articles.title: Trump Mobile: A New Era in Telecommunications for Trump's Followers
articles.author: Frank Nez
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched Trump Mobile, a new mobile phone service. The service aims to resonate with the loyal following of former President.

articles.title: Meta's Advantage+ Adds Gen AI Tools for Advertisers and Agencies
articles.author: Mark Mwachiro
articles.summary: Meta is launching new generative AI features for advertisers and agencies within its Advantage+ platform. The features include video generation capabilities, AI-driven highlight extraction, voice features, AI-generated prompts, new ad placements on Instagram Stories and Facebook Reels, and enhancements to Virtual Try-On. These updates aim to improve campaign performance and drive sales.

articles.title: How Is Hayward Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:HAYW) Expanding Pool Innovation in Line With Russell 1000 Manufacturing Trends?
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Hayward introduces automation through app-based control systems and digitally connected devices. These new features enable users to remotely manage pool performance, including filtration, water chemistry, and lighting. The introduction of smart technologies optimizes energy use and enables customized water care.

articles.title: OnePlus to launch 2 new phones under ₹30000 very soon in India- Details
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its Nord 5 series globally on July 8, 2025, featuring the Nord 5 and Nord 5 CE models. The OnePlus Nord 5 will be powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 processor and feature a 7300mm square VC cooling system, a 6.83-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, and a 6700mAh battery. Additionally, the launch event may also introduce OnePlus Buds 4, OnePlus Watch 3, and OnePlus Pad Lite.

articles.title: Trumps' new venture: A mobile phone company
articles.author: TNN
articles.summary: Trump's sons, Eric and Don Jr., launched Trump Mobile, a mobile phone service, with a subscription plan called the '47 Plan' priced at $47.45 per month. Trump Mobile plans to release a $499 Android phone made in America in Aug 2025.

articles.title: Tinder now lets you plan double dates with your bestie
articles.summary: Tinder is introducing a new 'Double Date' feature designed to alleviate dating pressure, particularly for Gen Z users. This feature, tested in Europe for a few months, aims to create a more social dating experience.

articles.title: Toyota Just Dropped Its Cheapest Long-Range EV Yet—But Only in China
articles.author: Eric Collins
articles.summary: Toyota has launched its newest electric vehicle, the bZ5, in China, which utilizes batteries from BYD. The base model starts at 129,800 CNY and features a 65.28 kWh LFP battery providing a 550 km range, while the top model has a 73.984 kWh battery delivering 630 km range.

articles.title: Big tech on a quest for ideal AI device
articles.author: AFP
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with Jony Ive, the former chief design officer at Apple, to develop a new AI gadget. The prototype, described as a 'coolest piece of technology,' is expected to be a device that moves beyond current legacy products. The device will not have a screen and is not worn like a watch.

articles.title: Amazon Singapore's Prime Day Returns in July with First-Ever Week-Long Event from 8 to 14 July
articles.author: Amazon Singapore
articles.summary: Amazon Singapore announced Prime Day 2025, running from July 8-14, offering discounts on products from various brands like FOREO, Sukin, Dettol, UGREEN, Renpho, SMEG, and Roborock. Prime members can access these deals and enjoy additional perks such as discounts on Amazon Fresh and access to the Everyday Essentials store for daily necessities.

articles.title: Trump Family Announces Another Venture, A Mobile Phone Company (Video)
articles.author: News
articles.summary: The Trump company has announced Trump Mobile, a new cell service business that will also sell gold phones. Eric Trump emphasizes the patriotism aspect of the venture, highlighting that the phones will be built in the U.S. and the phone service will maintain a call center in the country.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Lucid Air vehicles now support Android Auto
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: Lucid Group, based in Newark, has launched a software update for all Lucid Air vehicles, introducing Android Auto integration. This new feature enhances the driving experience by seamlessly integrating Android smartphones with the vehicle's system.

articles.title: Trump Mobile Launch Sparks Memefest Online: Donald Trump Organisation Announces New Phone Service and the Internet Can't Stop ROFLing at the Funny Memes and Jokes
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has announced the launch of 'Trump Mobile,' a new phone service priced at USD 499 for the device and USD 47.45 per month for service. The gold-colored phone features an American flag and T1 inscribed on its back.

articles.title: Rare Air Jordan 11 Is On Sale For $108
articles.author: Kenyun Mazique
articles.summary: Nike released the Air Jordan 11 'Neapolitan' on November 11, 2023, through the Nike SNKRS app and multiple Nike retailers. The shoe, resembling the 'Concord' colorway with a pink bottom, is currently available on StockX.

articles.title: LGU+, 대학생 앰배서더 ‘유쓰피릿' 16기 모집 실시
articles.summary: LG U+ is recruiting the 16th batch of university student ambassadors, 'Youth Spirit', to promote its services, including the AI call agent 'ixi-O' and the AI-based voice phishing prevention technology 'Anti-Deep Voice,' to Generation Z. The selected students will participate in various activities, including Youth Brand Campaign and YouTube content creation.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 4 price drop alert: Get the 8GB RAM, 256GB, Obsidian Midnight variant at up to Rs. 5,000 off ahead of OnePlus Nord 5 launch
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: OnePlus has reduced the price of its Nord 4 smartphone to under ₹25,000 due to the imminent launch of the Nord 5. The Nord 4 features a Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 chip, a 6.74" 120 Hz OLED screen, and 100 W fast charging. The company will also launch the Nord CE 5 and OnePlus Buds 4 in India on July 8.

articles.title: Basatne MENA, Likewize launch smartphone subscription programme
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: Basatne MENA and Likewize have partnered to launch 'Upgrade & Protect', a subscription-based smartphone program. This program allows users to upgrade, swap, or protect their devices through a flexible monthly subscription. The initiative aims to offer value and convenience to consumers and generate recurring revenue for telecom operators.

articles.title: Prodapt Announces Agentic Solutions for Autonomous Operations Powered by NVIDIA AI Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Prodapt, in collaboration with NVIDIA, has launched a new Agentic AI-based solution aimed at driving autonomous operations for Telcos. The solution utilizes NVIDIA's AI platform to deploy Telco-trained AI Agents that can predict, analyze, reason, and simulate to resolve service quality and customer experience issues. The first Autonomous Agent focuses on network operations to improve issue resolution workflow.

articles.title: Thread by @HritikGuptaAI on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: The method involves using ChatGPT to generate comparison scripts for products like Beats Studio Pro on Amazon. These scripts are then used in Fliki, a video editing tool, to create product review videos with AI avatars.  Affiliate links are included in the video descriptions to earn commissions on sales.

articles.title: Trump Mobile unveiled amid tariff threat against Apple and Samsung
articles.author: Colorado Politics
articles.summary: The Trump Organization introduced Trump Mobile, a new wireless phone service. This launch represents the company's entry into the telecommunications sector by offering mobile services.

articles.title: no7 moisturiser review
articles.author: Melody Teh
articles.summary: No7 has launched its Future Renew Repair Day Cream, the latest addition to its Future Renew range. This day cream targets visible signs of skin damage with ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid and No7's exclusive peptide blend, Pepticology. The product is designed to hydrate, improve skin health, and provide a smoother, brighter appearance.

articles.title: Trump's sons announce mobile phone company
articles.author: Aria Chen
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched 'Trump Mobile,' a new wireless service designed to compete with major US carriers. Concurrently, they announced and initiated pre-orders for a new gold smartphone.

articles.title: Beyond Google: The Rise of Vertical & Private Search Engines
articles.summary: The article highlights the importance of optimizing content for vertical search engines like Amazon and YouTube, and private search engines like DuckDuckGo, in addition to Google. It offers specific tips for beginners on adapting their content format, tracking performance, and experimenting with different strategies to increase online visibility on these platforms. The article suggests that optimizing for these various platforms can help diversify outreach efforts and future-proof online strategy.

articles.title: Trump Mobile launches with gold phone, $77 plan amid conflict concerns
articles.author: Drew Harwell
articles.summary: Trump's family business is licensing his name to a new mobile phone service, Trump Mobile. The service, unveiled at Trump Tower in New York, will offer gold smartphones and a US$47 monthly plan.

articles.title: Mystery surrounds 'huge' Woolworths news that foodies in the know are gossiping about
articles.author: SHARON HUNT
articles.summary: Golden Bakery is launching a new limited-edition Banana Bread flavored crumpet in Woolworths stores. The crumpets, made with real banana, will be sold in packets of six. The upcoming product launch has generated significant interest among consumers.

articles.title: 34 Reviewer-Beloved "Internet Famous" Amazon Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Amazon features an "Internet Famous" section with TikTok-viral products like Lumify Eye Drops for redness reduction and La Roche-Posay Anthelios SPF 40 Tinted Sunscreen as a foundation replacement. Also featured are Lottabody's Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, The Ordinary's Multi-Depth Hydration Serum, Monday Haircare Dry Shampoo, L'Oreal Paris Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist, and Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener.

articles.title: Trump family company announces next venture: a mobile phone company
articles.author: Bernard Condon
articles.summary: The Trump company announced the launch of Trump Mobile, a new cell service that will be offered through a licensing deal and will sell gold phones. The monthly service, called The 47 Plan, includes unlimited calls, texts, data, roadside assistance, and telehealth services for $47.45 per month. The Trump Organization said the new T1 Phone, available for $499 in August, won't be designed or made by Trump Mobile, but by another company.

articles.title: 47 Cheap Product Swaps That You'll Wish You Made A Long Time Ago
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article highlights several affordable alternatives to popular, pricier beauty and fashion products. For example, Essence's Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops provide a cost-effective alternative to Drunk Elephant, while Dossier's "Ambery Vanilla" perfume is presented as a budget-friendly option to YSL's Black Opium. Similarly, Catrice's Magic Shaper Face Cream Palette is offered as an $8 alternative to Makeup Forever's $88 palette.

articles.title: New Look shoppers 'can't wait' to buy £22 linen waistcoat in every colour
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: New Look is offering the Crew Neck Linen Blend Waistcoat, currently priced at £22.49 and available in multiple colors and sizes. It is made from a linen-blend fabric and features an angular hem cut-out. New Look also offers Linen Blend Wide Leg Trousers for a matching look.

articles.title: 31 Stylish Summer Dresses For A Pants-Free Season
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Hill House Home's Nap Dress is highlighted as a popular and versatile item, with the author stating they own 12 dresses in different colors and prints and have worn them before, during, and after pregnancy. The article promotes readers to get one for themselves.

articles.title: Trump mobile phone company announced by president's family, but details are murky
articles.author: Sharon Lafraniere
articles.summary: The Trump Organization, led by Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr., launched Trump Mobile, a new mobile phone and cellular service. The company plans to release its own phone, the 'T1,' in August and offers a '47 plan' for US$47.45 a month, including telemedicine services. Trump Mobile service will operate through three major cellphone carriers: AT&T, Verizon and T-Mobile.

articles.title: Donald Trump's sons dial into a new mobile phone venture with ‘made in America' handsets
articles.summary: Donald Trump's sons are venturing into the mobile phone market. The venture involves handsets that are 'made in America,' indicating a new product offering.

articles.title: First Ningxia goji berry harvest season opens
articles.author: 王丹宁
articles.summary: Ningxia Bairuiyuan has launched goji berry gift boxes to market its brand. These gift boxes represent a new product offering, and customers nationwide can expect to receive their orders within 48 hours, highlighting the company's focus on efficient delivery and wider market reach.

articles.title: Trump sons to launch Trump Mobile, U.S.-built phone
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: The Trump Organization is launching a mobile phone service named Trump Mobile. They also plan to release a U.S.-built smartphone, the T1 Phone, in August. Customers can use the new service with their existing phones or purchase the new gold smartphone designed and built in the United States.

articles.title: What you need to know about Trump Mobile's ambitious phone plans
articles.author: Newstalk ZB
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has launched 'Trump Mobile,' a new mobile phone service. The service will offer gold smartphones and cost US$47 a month. The unveiling occurred at Trump Tower in New York.

articles.title: Kia Tasman Blazes New Trail for Pickup Truck Segment with Exceptional Off-Road Ability
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Kia has designed the Tasman, its first pickup truck, from the ground up.

articles.title: Trump mobile launched:  Internet can't stop laughing at the wildest features
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Donald Trump has launched Trump Mobile, a new smartphone service. The service aims to 'MAKE CALLS GREAT AGAIN.'

articles.title: I tested the Sony Bravia 8 II OLED TV, and I don't think Samsung and ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Sony has released its new Bravia 8 II flagship OLED TV. The TV is positioned in the premium price segment and faces competition from other OLED TVs.

articles.title: Oppo launches A5i smartphone priced from RM399, featuring 6.67in screen and 5,100mAh battery
articles.author: The Star
articles.summary: Oppo launched the A5i, a new budget-oriented smartphone. The A5i features a Snapdragon 6s 4G Gen1 processor and a 6.67in display with a 720p resolution and up to a 90Hz refresh rate.

articles.title: Trump family launching a mobile phone company
articles.author: BERNARD CONDON
articles.summary: The Trump company has announced a new business venture, Trump Mobile, which will offer cell service through a licensing deal. Additionally, the company plans to sell gold phones by the summer. This marks a new product offering from the Trump organization.

articles.title: Adobe Just Launched Firefly App On iPhone And Android For AI Content Generation On The Go
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Adobe has released the Firefly app for mobile devices, including iPhones and Android phones. This mobile version allows users to capture creative ideas on the go, offering text-to-image, text-to-video, and image-to-video tools. Additionally, Adobe updated Firefly Boards with video generation capabilities, enabling users to remix clips and generate new footage.

articles.title: 15 Baby Shower Gifts From Amazon Canada That Are Under $30 That Are Actually Useful
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Live Clean introduces a bath and skin kit designed for new parents. This kit provides a comprehensive solution for bath time and bedtime routines.

articles.title: Trump Launches New Mobile Phone Business
articles.author: Colombia One
articles.summary: The Trump Organization has announced a new business venture: a mobile phone company. The new smartphone will be priced at US$499, aimed at providing affordable wireless service.

articles.title: This Best-Selling Travel Backpack Is On Sale at Amazon Ahead of Prime Day
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Amazon's Prime Day sales event for 2025 is approaching, with early deals already available. The event promotes various products and services through discounted offers.

articles.author: The Source

articles.summary: Nintendo released its latest mainline console last week. This constitutes a new product introduction by the company.

articles.title: Innovation takes backseat amid tariffs
articles.author: Record
articles.summary: Companies are introducing toy robots designed to teach children coding skills. They are also producing sneakers manufactured in America and kitchen gadgets engineered to resist mold.

articles.summary: Reddit introduced a suite of AI-driven advertising solutions. This represents a new offering from the company in the advertising domain. The solutions are powered by AI.

articles.author: Usatoday
articles.summary: The Trump Organization launched Trump Mobile, a new cellular service, along with the 'T1' smartphone. However, shortly after its launch, the venture retracted its coverage map.

articles.title: Is Liquid Glass All That? How the New iOS 26 Design Compares With iOS 18
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Liquid Glass introduces a new translucent polish for iPhones. This new product is compared to iOS 18.

articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: A company's AI-powered robot, ADAM, is transforming beverage service. This allows human employees to focus on customer engagement, enhancing the overall service experience.

articles.title: Samsung set to launch Galaxy Z Fold 7, Z Flip 7, FE and Watch 8 ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, a new Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE fan edition, and the Watch 8 series at its Galaxy Unpacked event next month. The launch is expected to introduce these devices to the market.

articles.summary: Lion Pose and Lume Deodorant are offering products with significant savings. Tory Johnson is highlighting these deals.

articles.title: Here's How Sparky Will Soon Help Walmart Shoppers in Maine, New Hampshire, & Massachusetts
articles.author: Cooper Fox
articles.summary: Walmart has launched Sparky, a new genAI feature within its app, designed to help customers quickly find products using natural language. Sparky understands normal speech, allowing users to search for items and information using everyday language, such as searching 'hot breakfast cereal' to find oatmeal or asking about the weather for a concert and receiving outfit recommendations.
